result.execSummary:
The defendant Adam R. Pecha was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Costs/DNA of $463 payable to Clerk of Courts thru existing wage assignment..  In default of payment, referral to State Debt Collection.  Submit DNA Sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: 1:02 PM   Court calls 22CF150 and 22CF75.  Defendant Adam R. Pecha in court.  Attorney Aaron M Krzewinski in court for Adam R. Pecha. Attorney Amy Pautzke in court for State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews plea agreement.  22CF75 Ct. 1 reviewed and Deft. enters a NO CONTEST Plea.  Ct. 2 reviewed and Deft. enters a NO CONTEST Plea.  22CF150 Ct. 1 reviewed and Deft. enters a NO CONTEST Plea.  Plea quest. & waiver of rights reviewed.  Court finds plea made freely & voluntarily.  Court accepts plea and Deft. is adjudged guilty/orders a JOC entered into the record.  22CF75 Ct. 3 -  dismissed.  Victim makes Stmt.  Sentence argument by State.  Sentence argument by Defense.  Stmt. by Deft.  Court sentence:  22CF75 - Ct. 1 WI State Probation 2 years Sentence Withheld.  Conditions of Probation - 25 days jail Report 10/14/22 at 4 pm w/huber, good time, 3 days credit.  No possession/consumption of alcohol and not to be on premise of residence. Supervision fees as ordered and payable to DOC during probation.   Complete all assessments, counseling and treatment deemed necessary by agent.  Submit DNA Sample.  Dean fees.  Costs/DNA of $463.  Ct. 2 - Costs/DNA $463 & submit DNA Sample.  22CF150-Costs/DNA of $463 & submit DNA Sample.  Dean fees and Costs/DNA  payable to Clerk of Courts thru current wage assignment.  Money on deposit to be applied.

9:34 AM Prosecuting attorney Amy R. Greenwood Pautzke in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Adam R. Pecha in court.  Attorney Aaron M Krzewinski in court for Adam R. Pecha. VWC Rachael Race in court. Court makes stmt. Victim rights. PQW received/reviewed by the Court w/ the defendant. Court finds the defendant's waiver to be made freely and voluntarily and accepts the waiver. Court further finds probable cause a felony has been committed and defendant is bound over to the circuit court. Defendant ordered to appear at next hrg. Present bond cont'd.
Arraignment scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
